info.name: Windows angle bug #65
info.description:
On Windows/Angle, cond ? ( a = expr(1), a ) : ( a = expr(2), a ) doesn't always work (top) while if/else is ok (bottom):
 a = expr(1) , a = expr(2) is evaluated prior everything.

On OpenGL, left= grey and right= white.
On Windows/Angle, top/left = white.
